data.name: NHL Sense Arena
data.description:
Train like a PRO, compete like a PRO, be an NHLer!

NHL Sense Arena is a hockey training tool that simulates game-like scenarios to improve your game and makes training fun by competing in real-time multiplayer challenges with others in the hockey community.

Experience the NHL like never before! Choose to train as your favorite team, dress in your team's NHL locker room, wear your team's uniform, and compete against all 32 NHL teams. Practice just like Devon Levi and Taylor Heise in real-time multiplayer competitions and take part in the NHL Season, including the NHL All-Star Game VR Challenge, en route to lifting the coveted Lord Stanley's Cup!

Whether you are an aspiring youth player, an enthusiastic fan, or a rising hockey star, NHL Sense Arena is the perfect solution for engaging in immersive off-ice practice that closely mimics the on-ice experience. It's a great way to train and enhance your skills to become an NHLer!

Headlined by Devon Levi of the Buffalo Sabers and Taylor Heise of Team Minnesota in the PWHL, NHL Sense Arena is used by NHL, PWHL, and top NCAA hockey players to refine and enhance their skills. Other notable users include Joel Hofer of the Blues, Joe Daccord of the Kraken, Drew Commesso of the Black Hawks, and many others who make Sense Arena VR part of their training routine. 

NHL Sense Arena offers training modules for both PLAYERS and GOALIES.  

Proud to be "The Official VR Training Tool of USA Hockey".

*Paid subscription required.
